column4: ive installed ubuntu 8.04 hardy (which is very close to perfectness) and i need help in one thing. can anyone please help me?
kk i got it!
in the resolution settings thing, it doesnt detect any monitor at all, it says "unknown"
while in xorg.conf its supposed to say configured monitor
dunno why it says "unknown"
the problem is
that this causes me not to be able to use 60 herts mode
can anyone help me?
i guess not...
Ubuntu 8.04 doesn't detect my monitor and i can't use 60 refresh rate mode. can anyone help now?
50 Hz refresh rate works fine too.
i have only one monitor
i use 50 hz while i know i can use 60
i used envy to get the latest. which seemed to work
what's the difference ?
i now use the accelerated drivers
the difference is, that i cant use 60 hz mode while in xp i can
did you get Sun Java ?
no
would getting sun java help somehow? i mean, its monitor related problem
go to medibuntu repository and follow instructions there. Delete OpenJDK and install Sun Java and all the other nice stuff.
